Text: RE SportsCom cobranding Cc Dave Thanks for forwarding this It does look very good Just a couple of comments With respect to a disclaimer on content although Enron does have an indemnity it may be worth putting in place some preventative measures just in case I suggest something along the lines of The information on this site is provided solely by Sportscom and its licensors However neither Enron nor Sportscom take any responsibility or make any warranty about the accuracy or completeness of such information and any reliance you place on it is at your own risk I tried clicking on the Minutemania link and nothing happened I just wanted to check the registration page if there already is one PLease contact me if you have any questions Kind regards Marly Didizian Original Message From Dave Samuels mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Justin Boyd Cc Mark Taylor Subject SportsCom cobranding Here is what the proposed site would look like following the link from the EnronOnline quotes screen From a commercial and design perspective it looks great Any legal issues Louise raised the idea that we may want to add a disclaimer that the content is provided by Sportscom I told her that we had an indemnification from them with respect to libel etc Please let me know if you think we need to add this thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Donald Cuthbertson on AM Please respond to Donald Cuthbertson To Dave nroncom cc Subject SportsCom cobranding Hello Dave Kevin Arrix is currently having problems with his email at the moment so I am contacting you directly with the latest revised example of the Enron cobranded page I am doing the graphic work on the page so if there are any changes regarding the look you can contact me directly Cheers Donald Cuthbertson SportsCom UK ext See attached file Enron Examplejpg This message is confidential It may also be privileged or otherwise protected by work product immunity or other legal rules If you have received it by mistake please let us know by reply and then delete it from your system you should not copy the message or disclose its contents to anyone
